title: 2/bd 1/ba, Resident social lounge, Onsite playground
posting_body: Maris at Martinez is your everyday escape, ideally nestled in the hills of the East Bay.
Our 1 & 2 bedroom apartments feature gorgeous spaces designed for high-end style and comfort.
Modern finishes are sleek and chic throughout the home, while energy-efficient appliances and an in-home washer and dryer effortlessly keep chores under control.

Private balcony or patio-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator, electric range, and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Featured amenity-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas-Upgraded interior-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat-Large closets with extra storage

Resident social lounge-Immediate access to State Route 4-Virtual moving concierge – Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi-5.45 acres of lush landscaped grounds-Relaxing resort-style pool and sundeck                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Controlled-entry access with dedicated and covered parking                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Terrace featuring barbecue pavilion and firepit                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Onsite bike storage-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)
